GapFillInput.Instruction: Type the correct reflexive or object pronoun or each other in each gap. If no pronoun is necessary, type ‘-‘.

Content.Question:
1 I enjoy relaxing - in front of the TV in the evenings.
2 For my birthday my parents gave me a Swiss watch.
3 Did you make it yourself|- or did someone help you?
4 When we go camping in the mountains we wash ourselves and our clothes in the river.
5 Alvaro and Maria were so in love they couldn't stop looking at each other.
6 Our hosts didn't have a camera so we took one with us.
7 I cut myself while I was preparing the vegetables.
8 The film starts at eight so let's meet - at seven thirty.
9 Does your washing machine turn itself off or do you have to do it?
10 To complete the task, Jonathan had to concentrate - very hard.
